external_references.description: Ehrlich, A., et al. (2022, September). THE MYSTERY OF METADOR | AN UNATTRIBUTED THREAT HIDING IN TELCOS, ISPS, AND UNIVERSITIES. Retrieved January 23, 2023.

description: [Metador](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1013) has used unique malware in their operations, including [metaMain](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1059) and [Mafalda](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1060).(Citation: SentinelLabs Metador Sept 2022)
